title: [SOLVED] Why Can't you Gift Bundles?
body: Wanted to give my partner the star guardian bundle as a gift, but found out I couldn't gift them.

replies.body: AFAIK the main reason you can't gift bundles is simply due to how they work internally. Trying to gift those bundles might cause some issues with how they're coded.

Can you not make the new SG skins a bundle and only sell the 'First Editon' Skin alone so people can gift it? I find it very annoying to buy $50 or $100 of my hard earned money only to find out I cannot gift my friends or partner.
